channel.title: Development Environments
channel.description: Nix for Everyone: Unleash Devbox for Simplified DevelopmentNix is amazing, but also very difficult to manage. It assumes that you learned its programming language and that you are willing to ignore frastration generated by horrible documentation. I think it is one of the most useful projects out there that cannot be used by anyone but those willing to dedicate their lives to Nix.

item.title: Nix for Everyone: Unleash Devbox for Simplified Development
item.description: Nix is amazing, but also very difficult to manage.
